Package src.main.persistence.classes

Class IndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.main.persistence.classes.IndexManager
  • public class IndexManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Index Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the indexs (Trie, Inverted Index and Vectorial Index).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IndexManager()
      Constructor of the Index Manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Object loadInvertedIndex()
      This function returns the last saved Inverted Index.
      java.lang.Object loadTrie()
      This function returns the last saved Author Index (Trie).
      java.lang.Object loadVectorialIndex()
      This function returns the last saved Vectorial Index.
      void saveInvertedIndex​(java.lang.Object InvertedIndex)
      Saves the current Inverted Index in a specific hard-coded path.
      void saveTrie​(java.lang.Object Trie)
      Saves the current Author Index (Trie) in a specific hard-coded path.
      void saveVectorialIndex​(java.lang.Object VectorialIndex)
      Saves the current Vectorial Index in a specific hard-coded path.

      • saveTrie

        public void saveTrie​(java.lang.Object Trie)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the current Author Index (Trie) in a specific hard-coded path.
        Parameters:
        Trie - The Author Index itself with type Object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the Index can't be saved, this exception is thrown.
